title: Onboarding — Validate end-to-end flow
description: Validate the full onboarding wizard flow end-to-end. No structural changes required — just verify it works correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: No validation failures on form submissions
Routing post-completion directs to correct page

steps.details: Navigate to the onboarding wizard. Complete each step with valid data. Verify progression through all steps.
After completing onboarding, check Supabase for the created records. Verify all form data was saved correctly.
After onboarding completes, confirm the user is redirected to the correct page (likely admin dashboard or client detail).

technicalNotes: This is a validation task — no code changes expected unless issues are found
